name: text-stats
description: Analyze text for word count, reading time, character count, and platform limits. Useful for checking message lengths before posting.
author: SPARK

functions.name: analyze
functions.description: Get comprehensive text statistics including word count, character count, sentences, paragraphs, reading time, and speaking time

functions.name: checkLimits
functions.description: Analyze text and check against common platform character limits (Twitter, Discord, SMS, Slack)

returns.platformLimits: Status for Twitter (280), Discord (2000), SMS (160), Slack (40000)

examples.call: analyze('Hello world, this is a test.')
